name: Split Jack

topics.response_text: Hi, I'm Split Jack. I'm recording this 'cause I figure half you idiots can't read for shit. But you best don't lay this tape around just anywhere!{Split Jack is his name, deadly serious - leaving a message for new recruits}

topics.topic_text: So long. I'll see you in a week.
topics.response_text: Right boss. G'luck out there. The Wastes are dangerous! Ahaha.{joking}

topics.topic_text: Not good enough. Give me your caps, or I'll take them from your corpse.
topics.response_text: Just don't hurt me, alright? Here's all my caps.{scared}

topics.topic_text: Come on, I know you've got something more. Quit holding out on me.
topics.response_text: Fine. Here's an extra 50 caps. Now get out of here until next week.

topics.topic_text: Ahem. If it wasn't for me, there'd be no protection racket.
topics.response_text: Yeah. I guess you're right. Here's a bigger share of the take. We'll see you next week.{begrudgingly}

topics.topic_text: Give me more. Or I'll bust you upside the head.
topics.response_text: Damnit man, why you got to be like that? Here. Take half my caps. Then get the hell out of here until next week.{partly scared partly annoyed}
Okay. You're lucky you knew that. Don't know who let you in, don't really care.{tough guy}

topics.topic_text: Pass phrase? I don't know anything about a pass phrase.
topics.response_text: Sad for you. 'Cause only people that know the pass phrase get away with snooping around our business.{sarcastic anger, about to kill someone}

topics.topic_text: Ummm... oh yeah, the pass phrase. It's "Eye patch"!
topics.response_text: Very funny, asshole. You won't be laughing when I'm done with you.{deadly anger (he has an eye patch, thinks the player is mocking him)}
The hell's that supposed to mean? No matter. That ain't the pass phrase, so you're dead, asshole.{deadly serious and about to murder}
No one told you? It's simple. We hit water caravans and stash the Aqua Pura...{explaining the plan as if to a moron}

topics.topic_text: It's time for someone else to take charge. You and me. Right now. Time to die.
topics.response_text: You got a deathwish? Fine by me. Knives, pipes, or boards?{accepting a duel}
Great. Here's a Combat Knife. Use that and only that. I get hit with something other than that, or by anyone else, and my boys join in.{explaining rules of the duel}
Great. Here's a Lead Pipe. Use that and only that. I get hit with something other than that, or by anyone else, and my boys join in.{explaining rules of the duel}
Great. Here's a Nail Board. Use that and only that. I get hit with something other than that, or by anyone else, and my boys join in.{explaining rules of the duel}
Did I say guns? No I didn't. I said, Knives, Pipes, or Boards. I'm still the boss of this gang, so I still set the rules. So what will it be asshole?{annoyed, setting rules to a duel}
Didn't think so. Now, sit down and shut up.{cocky}

topics.topic_text: I came for the job. You still hiring guns?
topics.response_text: Huhnn. You're one of the newbies then. Fine. So long as you know the pass phrase, you're in. If not -- you're dead.{smiling while offering a serious threat}

topics.topic_text: I'm here to send you and your gang into retirement. Got any last words?
topics.response_text: Damnit. And I was just gonna have some stew that Grandma whipped up. Fine. Have it your way asshole.{about to murder someone}

topics.topic_text: I'm nobody you need to worry about.
topics.response_text: Brother, I worry 'bout everybody. Can't trust no one. You know the pass phrase?
That so? You're one of the newbies?  You best know the pass phrase asshole. Or you're dead.{a serious threat}
You an idiot or something? I don't got much like for idiots. You better know the pass phrase, asshole.{annoyed}

topics.topic_text: They're not going to pay you to protect something they're giving away for free.
topics.response_text: What? Well...{confused}
Backstabbed us and sold us out, did ya?{angry}
Nice try asshole. Come back in a week, you'll get your next cut of the take then.{mildly annoyed}

description:
Split Jack is a 38 year-old Asian Male.

Split Jack is the leader of a mercenary gang operating in the Capital Wasteland. Once an average wasteland raider, he has transformed his ruthless tendencies into a keen business sense. Now commanding a group of bandits, he has devised a plan to attack water caravans and extort the Water Distribution Network. He has established a simple power hierarchy among his crew, where the toughest lead, and his underlings follow his orders without question. Split Jack can typically be found at Wilhelm's Wharf, coordinating his operations.

Split Jack's Personality: Ruthless, cunning, and ambitious. Split Jack combines his raider instincts with a strategic business mind, always looking for opportunities to profit from the chaos of the wasteland. He values strength and loyalty but has no qualms about betraying or eliminating those who stand in his way.

Split Jack's Backstory: Split Jack began his life in the wasteland as a common raider, preying on travelers and settlements for survival. However, he grew tired of the disorganization and constant infighting that plagued raider groups. Recognizing the value of a more structured approach, he broke away and formed his own gang, combining his combat skills with a surprisingly sharp business acumen. Over the years, he has built a reputation as a mercenary who gets the job done, no matter how dirty it may be.
